abstract: Egidio Raúl Arévalo Ríos (Spanish pronunciation: [eˈxiðjo aˈɾeβalo ˈri.os]), also known as Egidio Arévalo or Arévalo Rios (born January 1, 1982), is a Uruguayan footballer who plays for Morelia in Liga MX on loan from Tigres de la UANL.
comment: Egidio Raúl Arévalo Ríos (Spanish pronunciation: [eˈxiðjo aˈɾeβalo ˈri.os]), also known as Egidio Arévalo or Arévalo Rios (born January 1, 1982), is a Uruguayan footballer who plays for Morelia in Liga MX on loan from Tigres de la UANL.
